article_node.title: This less-crowded hike in Yosemite features meadows, wildflowers and epic views
article_node.summary: The article offers a detailed guide for hiking and camping in Los Angeles and Kings Canyon National Park, covering trail options, safety tips, packing lists, bear precautions, and additional activities, while emphasizing the appeal of less crowded natural areas and practical advice for visitors.
